ygData.messageBody:
I am sorry anyone took my last two posts as a flame or insulting. Neither
was meant in such an context. If the whole graphics change was in reference
to new armors etc. My bad. I was only refering to having visible headbands
and sashes, which is what I thought the general theme of the discussion was.
I had agreed with the post in the sense that large scale changes werent
possible. Though maybe I was uncclear. While I dont like that we dont have
any armor changes I can see why this was implemented, monks on a whole arent
the most fashionable people nor do they change clothes twice a day. They are
simple people and as as such we are given simple clothes!
I think some people on this board have had some great ideas for gloves and
monk modifiers, something the class sorely needs. But how do we go about
trying to get notice to these ideas? Was there a movement amongst the
rangers to get crits or was that a developer idea? Is there a place to find
what changes are being tried on the test server? Are the monks being tweaked
on the test server at all?

P.S. IMHO other classes wont complain if we get our sash/headband
animiations, everyone I have talked to also thinks its a severe oversight!
Now if we got taunt, backflip, critical, nunchucks, and magic gloves other
classes might complain, a little ;)
